name: olio.llm.chatConfig
label: Chat Configuration
description: Configuration for a chat session with an LLM (Large Language Model). This includes settings for characters, narratives, interactions, and various options to control the chat experience.

fields.name: nlpCommand
fields.description: Brief phrase (not a complete sentence) of what to reinfore through NLP during a chat conversation

fields.name: universeName
fields.description: Name of any olio universe related to the characters or interactions.

fields.name: worldName
fields.description: Name of any olio world related to the characters or interactions.

fields.name: startMode
fields.description: Variant used to control how a chat begins

fields.name: remindEvery
fields.description: When assist is true, the number of user messages before any reminder text is included in the conversation history

fields.name: keyframeEvery
fields.description: When assist is true and prune is true, the number of messages after any previous keyframe or after the beginning of the message history before conducting a conversation analysis.  This is intended to be an objective summary of the conversation to preserve context and important details

fields.name: messageTrim
fields.description: When prune is true, sets the size of the message history to include in each request. messageTrim and keyframeEvery should be the same size when used in conjunction.  Note: The entire conversation is always preserved and may be used for summarization and analysis, this only affects the number of messages to include when using the chat capability.

fields.name: policy
fields.description: Development: Using a policy to route conversation requests through conditional rules and logic.

fields.name: extractMemories
fields.description: When true, the agent layer will automatically extract discrete memories (engrams) from chat sessions after save.
